summary: Comprehensive testing of Warp Battle 3D space combat game - both backend APIs and frontend UI functionality tested successfully. Fixed critical backend bug during testing.

critical_bugs.issue: RuntimeError: dictionary changed size during iteration in _broadcast_state method
critical_bugs.impact: Game crashes when players disconnect during state broadcast
critical_bugs.status: FIXED - Added dictionary copy to prevent iteration issues

minor_issues.issue: WebSocket endpoint returns 404 for HTTP requests (expected behavior)

passed_tests: Backend /api/ health endpoint returns 'Warp Battle Server Online'
Backend /api/rooms endpoint returns empty room array
Backend CORS configuration working properly
Lobby page loads with correct title 'WARP BATTLE'
Ship class selection works (Vanguard and Dreadnought cards)
Dreadnought class selection highlights correctly
Vanguard class selection highlights correctly
Callsign input and Launch button functionality
Launch button disabled/enabled state works correctly
Game page loads with 3D Babylon.js canvas
WebSocket connection establishes successfully
Game canvas renders with proper dimensions (1920x1080)
HUD displays correctly with ship status panel
Dreadnought shows correct stats (Hull 150, Shields 200, Energy 100)
Dreadnought shows passive indicator 'REINFORCED HULL -15% DMG'
Dreadnought shows 4 abilities (Q: SHIELDS, W: YAMATO, E: REPAIR, R: BOMBARD)
Vanguard shows correct stats (Hull 100, Shields 100, Energy 100)
Vanguard shows only 2 abilities (Q: WARP, W: MISSILES)
Vanguard has no passive indicator (correct)
Hull, Shield, and Energy bars display correctly
K/D display shows 'K: 0 / D: 0'
Minimap displays in top-left corner
Abilities panel shows correct number of abilities per ship class

success_percentage.backend: 80% (4/5 tests passed - WebSocket endpoint accessible but returns expected 404 for HTTP requests)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components and interactions working correctly)
